replies.msg: 啱啱到第一日就畀人偷咗

啱啱到第一日就畀人偷咗


What kind of passport is it? HKSAR or BN(O)?

If it is a HKSAR passpport, you will need to get in touch with Hong Kong Immigration Department's Assistance to Hong Kong Residents Unit by phone on (852) 1868

http://www.immd.gov.hk/eng/services/Assistance_Outside_Hong_Kong.html#a

You will then need to get a Chinese Travel Document from the Chinese consulate in Indonesia.

http://id.china-embassy.org/eng/sgxx/sglxfs/

If it is BN(O) passport - then you will need to get in touch with the British consulate in Indonesia to apply for an Emergency Travel Document -

https://www.gov.uk/emergency-travel-document

You can get the British consulate in Jakarta by phone on (+62) (21) 2356 5200

There is also a British Consulate at Bali - phone number is (+62) (21) 2356 5200

You can also e-mail to Consulate.Jakarta@fco.gov.uk or Consulate.Bali@fco.gov.uk

https://www.gov.uk/world/organisations/british-embassy-jakarta

你渣咩護照？除左印尼之外今次行程仲有冇其他國家？

首先去警署報失先，之後就睇你渣咩護照了。

渣BNO就去英國領事館，如果你而家在雅加達或者峇里，咁市內就有英國使館。去到申請緊急護照，話佢知你仲有邊d國家需要去，問吓個d國家係咪可以用本緊急護照去。

渣特區廁所板護照就麻煩d，要去中國領事館，要睇面色同耐好多，雅加達有使館。如果行程有其他國家，唔好意思，你要取消行程，因為中國使館出嘅係「中國旅行證」全球冇一個國家承認，連簽證都唔簽比你。同時，拎完本野要問清楚出境要唔要先去印尼入境部門補辦入境加簽。
